title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.5 - Parking or security stickers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.5 - Parking or security stickers

State Regulations
(a) Subject to the limitations of this
section, stickers identifying a vehicle for parking or security purposes may be
placed on the inside of the windshield in the lower right hand corner without
prior approval of the commissioner. Electronic parking tags may be placed on
the inside of the windshield in the lower left hand corner without prior
approval of the commissioner. (b) Stickers or electronic parking tags may not be of a size that would interfere
with visibility. The front surface of the sticker must be gummed so that it may
be attached to the inside of the windshield. (c) No vehicle may display more than two
parking or security stickers or electronic parking tags, or combination
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
